# Playing-with-mixture-models

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of this is to get a better sense of how mixture modeling works (I want to be able to make inferences about clusters)!

I'm basically following the handbook of mixture analysis (Sylvia et al).
